title: Textile, ca. 1835
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave; mordant for purple
dimensions:
Warp x Weft (a): 264.5 x 82 cm (8 ft. 8 1/8 in. x 32 5/16 in.)
Warp x Weft (b): 261.5 x 82 cm (8 ft. 6 15/16 in. x 32 5/16 in.)
Repeat H: 38.7 cm (15 1/4 in.)
description: Offset repeat of an exotic bird perched on top of a bowl of fruit. Three motifs within fabric width. Length of repeat: 38.7cm. (15 1/4"). Lengths of fabric continue repeat with 1/2" additional of pattern for seam allowance.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, ca. 1835. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave; mordant for purple. Gift of L'Antiquaire, Inc.. 1976-30-2-a,b.
